EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward - Last Chance to Apply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Last Chance to Apply!
Dear {Contact.FirstName},
A little while ago, you registered your interest in Step Forward. The programme offers you a chance to secure your future and you’re in luck because there’s still a chance to apply!
Summer is fast approaching and you will be thinking about what you want to do when you finish school or college. If you want a year of invaluable paid employment then Step Forward could be right for you! We are looking for are ambitious, committed and adaptable young people ready to take that first step.
Those who are selected and graduate from Step Forward will have:
completed 12 months of full time work with a high quality employer received a salary of £9,000 a nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level developed essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving received support from their own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond shared their experience with other like-minded people and formed lasting friendships​
Keep your options open and apply NOW for a great opportunity!
If we receive your application before Sunday 31st May, you will be entered into a competition to win one of the following prizes:
£20 Nando's Voucher £20 Topshop voucher A personal mentoring session with Jon Yates, co-founder of The Challenge
Follow the application form steps and apply today.
For hints and tips on how to write an impressive application form and maximise your chances of being selected, check out our step forward blog.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
Best of luck with your application, and we hope to see you at the Step Forward assessment!
Step Forward
